hello: do you know how to enable multiverse? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Repositories shows how.
the package you are looking for is in multiverse.
show us the file on paste.ubuntu-nl.org. DOn't worry, we love helping beginners.
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list, copy and paste the contents of the file to paste.ubuntu-nl.org
OK. add the word multiverse at the end of the deb line.
then save again. Then sudo aptitude update. YOu are using breezy?
you have to upgrade one version at a time.
did you edit the sources.list file again? add the word multiverse to the end of the lines you removed # from. Then save, close the file, and run sudo aptitude update
